strapiPost.title: Taco & Tamale Co. Coming To South Yard In Fayetteville
strapiPost.content:
Another Taco & Tamale Co. is coming to Northwest Arkansas, and itâ€™s going to be awesome. 

  • Moving in: The restaurant will be at the South Yard development in Fayetteville on the corner of Martin Luther King Jr. Blvd and South School Ave. It is scheduled to open in the spring of next year. Fayetteville Taco & Tamale Co. will focus on local, seasonal ingredients, making it a perfect choice for the South Yard vision. 
  • New spot: South Yard is scheduled to open in late 2022 as a development with four reused buildings with rich local agricultural history. The South Yard area formerly occupied by Farmers Cooperative will offer food and beverage establishments, entertainment, a small office, retail space, a new public park, and 128 apartments. 

Learn more HERE.
